mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_con_no , a.chat_con_time , a.chat_no , a.chat_cont , b.mem_nick , a.mem_id FROM chat_con a, member b WHERE a.chat_no = #{chat_no} AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id ORDER BY chat_con_no
SELECT to_char(a.chat_con_time,'MM/DD AM HH:MI') time , chat_cont , a.mem_id FROM chat_con a, chat b WHERE a.chat_con_no = #{chat_con_no} AND a.chat_no = b.chat_no ORDER BY a.chat_con_no
select * from chat_con where chat_con_no = (select max(chat_con_no) from chat_con) and chat_no = #{chat_no}
